We are a full-service video production company, crafted in San Francisco, dedicated to capturing your inspirational stories.www.promemorycatchers.com

As a Co-Founder and former Creative Director at RockBridge Productions, as well as an Owner at Area Code Media, I have been fortunate to have worked on may great video campaigns. I specialize in creative development, directing, and editing and have been working professionally in the Bay Area for nearly 10 years.I collaborate with agencies and production companies to direct and edit videos for their clients, but I also manage projects directly with businesses and corporate institutions. I aim to produce work that evokes emotion and leaves the viewer both inspired and hungry for more.I have worked with a wide range of clients such as:-Salesforce-Intuit-Square-Intel-Bank of the West-AT&T-Sidecar-Maybach-Sotherby's-Neiman Marcus-San Francisco Mayor, Ed LeeSee my work at:www.bryanfongcreative.com

•	Lead video editor responsible for assembling  captivating and compelling content with focus on precision to detail and unique storytelling.•	Post production supervisor who oversees the workflow of multiple editors.•	Creating and maintaining our brand's image.•	Participate in all aspects of production.•	Worked with clients in a variety of industries ranging from political campaigns, corporate marketing, and public works including Salesforce, Intuit, Square, AT&T, and San Francisco Mayor Ed Lee.
•	Lead videographer and editor on numerous projects which included: Music videos, corporate advertising,  and weddings.•	Managed proposals, budgets, and timelines.
recommendations: I’ve had the pleasure of knowing Bryan for the past 10+ years. We first collaborated when we were both fresh out of college. Bryan is an innovative, efficient, and reliable editor who can take on even the most challenging projects. His diversity of experience, creativity, and sharp technical skills make Bryan a huge asset to our extended team. He always delivers. It's a pleasure working with Bryan so I look forward to many more collaborations in the future.
